code: @Bean @Scope(value = "request", proxyMode = ScopedProxyMode.TARGET_CLASS) public ProxyFactoryBean myObject() {     ProxyFactoryBean pfb = new ProxyFactoryBean().     pfb.setTargetSource(poolTargetSource()).     return pfb. }

@Bean public CommonsPool2TargetSource poolTargetSource() {     CommonsPool2TargetSource pool = new CommonsPool2TargetSource().     pool.setMaxSize(3).     pool.setTargetBeanName("myObjectTarget").     return pool. }
@Bean(name = "myObjectTarget") @Scope(scopeName = "prototype") public Object myObjectTarget() {     return new Object(). }
